CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1946, pg. 8, reads: "Wedding Bells Ring - Genevieve Leslie Howard, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen E. Howard of Waring Court, became the bride of Charles Wesley Wilson, son of Mrs. Vernell Wilson of Berthoud Street, at Holy Cross Church, Saturday, July 6. Rev. Samuel Rudder officiated.  The new Mrs. Wilson received her master's degree in social work at Pittsburgh University in June, while the groom, now a student at the University of Duquesne, is a former Army captain.  The couple are at home at 2506 Hallet Street. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bride Genevieve Leslie Howard Wilson and groom Charles Wesley Wilson walking down aisle away from altar, in Holy Cross Church
